title: lagg issues on MAC
body:
so i got a macbook air recently and i have been playing league for a while on my old PC where it ran fine but since that old machine is long since gone (fan and CPU burnt itself out) i tried with my laptop, my first couple of games where fine but recently i can play at all, as soon as i hit loading screen my ping goes up to 700+ then in game i cant do anything because every 2nd second its 1K+ and can go down to about 200 before shooting up again.
now im on a wireless connection bc no ethernet port T.T
nobody else in the house does anything high bandwith-wise 

any help? 
thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

Apologies for the delayed response.

Could you run an MTR to the gameserver for me from your laptop.

To run an MTR on mac, please perform the following steps.

* Go [here](http://rudix.org/packages/mtr.html) and download the package appropriate for your version of OSX
* Install it
* [Open terminal](http://i.imgur.com/10nFokA.png)
* Run the following command and hit enter (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)

>sudo /usr/local/sbin/mtr 103.240.227.5

* After a reasonable amount of time has elapsed (5-15 minutes) please screenshot your results (follow steps below)
 * Hit cmd+shft+4, then hit space
 *  click on the Terminal window (your mouse cursor should turn into a camera icon and the window should be highlighted on mouse over)
* Upload the screenshot anywhere you would like and link here ([Imgur](http://imgur.com/), etc)


Could you also run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and post a link to your results here.
